results.content: I am a beginner and have been struggling with building menus, this course has allowed me build a menu which I like and insert it into a page.  I really liked this course and had fun with it.

results.content:
sub = links,display block has always confused myself, only because, I would reference "display" ( inline for "link items", and block for navigation )
------
showed me tricks on a problem that I was having problems with, particularly hover state, and sub-list items

results.content: Does exactly what it says - teaches you how to use CSS to make drop downs, plus some extra tricks. Super clear, easy to understand, the instructor is excellent, no wasted time, audio and video good quality.
